00032 #ifndef __LWIP_ICMP_H__
00033 #define __LWIP_ICMP_H__
00034 
00035 #include "lwip/arch.h"
00036 
00037 #include "lwip/opt.h"
00038 #include "lwip/pbuf.h"
00039 
00040 #include "lwip/netif.h"
00041 
00042 #define ICMP_ER 0      /* echo reply */
00043 #define ICMP_DUR 3     /* destination unreachable */
00044 #define ICMP_SQ 4      /* source quench */
00045 #define ICMP_RD 5      /* redirect */
00046 #define ICMP_ECHO 8    /* echo */
00047 #define ICMP_TE 11     /* time exceeded */
00048 #define ICMP_PP 12     /* parameter problem */
00049 #define ICMP_TS 13     /* timestamp */
00050 #define ICMP_TSR 14    /* timestamp reply */
00051 #define ICMP_IRQ 15    /* information request */
00052 #define ICMP_IR 16     /* information reply */
00053 
00054 enum icmp_dur_type {
00055   ICMP_DUR_NET = 0,    /* net unreachable */
00056   ICMP_DUR_HOST = 1,   /* host unreachable */
00057   ICMP_DUR_PROTO = 2,  /* protocol unreachable */
00058   ICMP_DUR_PORT = 3,   /* port unreachable */
00059   ICMP_DUR_FRAG = 4,   /* fragmentation needed and DF set */
00060   ICMP_DUR_SR = 5      /* source route failed */
00061 };
00062 
00063 enum icmp_te_type {
00064   ICMP_TE_TTL = 0,     /* time to live exceeded in transit */
00065   ICMP_TE_FRAG = 1     /* fragment reassembly time exceeded */
00066 };
00067 
00068 void icmp_input(struct pbuf *p, struct netif *inp);
00069 
00070 void icmp_dest_unreach(struct pbuf *p, enum icmp_dur_type t);
00071 void icmp_time_exceeded(struct pbuf *p, enum icmp_te_type t);
00072 
00073 #ifdef PACK_STRUCT_USE_INCLUDES
00074 #  include "arch/bpstruct.h"
00075 #endif
00076 PACK_STRUCT_BEGIN
00077 struct icmp_echo_hdr {
00078   PACK_STRUCT_FIELD(u16_t _type_code);
00079   PACK_STRUCT_FIELD(u16_t chksum);
00080   PACK_STRUCT_FIELD(u16_t id);
00081   PACK_STRUCT_FIELD(u16_t seqno);
00082 } PACK_STRUCT_STRUCT;
00083 PACK_STRUCT_END
00084 
00085 PACK_STRUCT_BEGIN
00086 struct icmp_dur_hdr {
00087   PACK_STRUCT_FIELD(u16_t _type_code);
00088   PACK_STRUCT_FIELD(u16_t chksum);
00089   PACK_STRUCT_FIELD(u32_t unused);
00090 } PACK_STRUCT_STRUCT;
00091 PACK_STRUCT_END
00092 
00093 PACK_STRUCT_BEGIN
00094 struct icmp_te_hdr {
00095   PACK_STRUCT_FIELD(u16_t _type_code);
00096   PACK_STRUCT_FIELD(u16_t chksum);
00097   PACK_STRUCT_FIELD(u32_t unused);
00098 } PACK_STRUCT_STRUCT;
00099 PACK_STRUCT_END
00100 #ifdef PACK_STRUCT_USE_INCLUDES
00101 #  include "arch/epstruct.h"
00102 #endif
00103 
00104 #define ICMPH_TYPE(hdr) (ntohs((hdr)->_type_code) >> 8)
00105 #define ICMPH_CODE(hdr) (ntohs((hdr)->_type_code) & 0xff)
00106 
00107 #define ICMPH_TYPE_SET(hdr, type) ((hdr)->_type_code = htons(ICMPH_CODE(hdr) | ((type) << 8)))
00108 #define ICMPH_CODE_SET(hdr, code) ((hdr)->_type_code = htons((code) | (ICMPH_TYPE(hdr) << 8)))
00109 
00110 #endif /* __LWIP_ICMP_H__ */
